title: (x) Permastore Tanks & Silos slogan casual script - Dear Joe {Mike Y}
content:
Hi:

It’s me again… now my client wants me to include the Brand’s slogan…

Here it is

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/tag_line_6036.gif)

Thanks in advance!

Q™ Says: It’s all about the Fonts!
author: Quesito

comments.content: I don’t know, but [Fineprint](http://web.archive.org/web/20061120151528/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=C.100805.0.0) or [Feltpen](http://web.archive.org/web/20061120151528/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=LH.102883.0.0) are decent alternatives.

Thanks Stephen!

Let’s wait for some more opinions… If not, I’ll use your second choice…

Q™ Says: It’s all about the Fonts!!

The font is Dear Joe Italic, as you can see in this sample from Part 11 (Everyday handprinting) of the Script Font ID Guide. It’s freeware from a Dutch site.

- Mike Yanega

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/dearJoeItal_5656.gif)

Since my last post on this thread I found that JOEBOB graphics fonts are now for sale at MyFonts. ‘dearJoe Italic’ is now referred to as [DearJoe 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20061120151528/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/joebob/dear-joe-1/).

- Mike Yanega

Roger That…

Thanks Guys! you’re awesome…

Q™ Says: It’s all about the Fonts!!
